mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM MAINLIST LEFT JOIN T_CID_ADDR ON MAINLIST.T_CID=T_CID_ADDR.T_CID ORDER BY AD_CODE

SELECT AD_CODE, AD_TITLE, AD_KIND, AD_STATUS, OP_TRAINER, OP_NAME, OP_CATEGORY, PS_MID FROM PS JOIN AD on PS_ADCODE = AD_CODE JOIN OP on PS_OPCODE = OP_CODE
WHERE PS_MID= #{m_id} AND AD_KIND='p'

SELECT AD_CODE, AD_TITLE, AD_KIND, AD_STATUS, OP_TRAINER, OP_NAME, OP_CATEGORY, PS_MID, C_BNAME FROM PS JOIN AD on PS_ADCODE = AD_CODE JOIN OP on PS_OPCODE = OP_CODE JOIN C ON AD_NAME=C_ID WHERE PS_MID= #{m_id} AND AD_KIND='mo'
